metadata.title: CVE-2020-25813 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In MediaWiki before 1.31.10 and 1.32.x through 1.34.x before 1.34.4,Special:UserRights exposes the existence of hidden users.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.35.0-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.35.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.35.0-1').
